section.title: Chapter 1: Introduction
section.paragraph: XML, or Extensible Markup Language, is a markup language that allows users to store and transport data.

section.title: Chapter 2: XML Syntax
section.paragraph: XML syntax is based on a set of rules, including the use of tags to define elements and attributes to provide additional information.

book.title: XSLT for Dummies
book.description: A guide to XSLT, a language for styling and transforming XML documents.

section.title: Chapter 1: Introduction to XSLT
section.paragraph: XSLT is a language for transforming XML documents, including styles and views.

section.title: Chapter 2: Basic XSLT Constructs
section.paragraph: In this chapter, we will explore the basic constructs of XSLT, including variables, conditions, and loops.
